title: Because We’re Together
detail_text: <:th_ch0003/>The sweet potatoes Nozomi-chan and Honoka-chan shared with us the other day were really delicious, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Yes, they were. I know they were a calorie bomb seeing as they’re covered in butter and honey.... But I couldn’t resist the temptation.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Fufu. You even went for seconds, huh, Umi-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>But you did as well, Kotori!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Well, I can’t hold back on good food, after all~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>It’s impressive how you manage to stay in shape, being like that....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>I laugh a lot when I’m with you and Honoka-chan, so that’s probably where all of the calories went.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Putting Honoka aside, what is there to laugh at when you’re with me....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Lots of things! But I won’t tell you what they are♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Eh? Now I’m curious.... Please tell me about them, Kotori~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
